Articles.Content:
I have a weird glitch happening on my modded install, where the VAB, when entered, has a shadow in the right corner outside the door. The same happens with the SPH, but a flipped building is outside the door instead. Everything seems to work fine, but when I select some parts, such as SP+ pods, they won't show up.

And when I launch a craft, it cuts to the KSC with an invisible ground, but Kerbal Konstructs buildings are visible. You can't move the camera, but the game still works. When you time accelerate, the view goes crazy and you start to fly off of Kerbin. The list of mods and screenshots is included in the Imgur album. This never happened before, and I even deleted some mods after this started, but it was all working fine for a few launches before this.

Imgur album

First off, Please follow the guideline here so its easier to narrow down the problems. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29

Things to trying the mean time.

If your using the 64 bit launcher switch to 32 bit and try again.

Try the game with no mods and see if the problem persists. if it does then ksp is possibly bugged.

If your copy of ksp is on steam then try a verify cache file check via the properties menu.
I figured out it was DebRefund anyways. I'm not sure how a simple mod like that could break the game so bad.
Thank you, I had DebRefund installed with a bunch of mods and for the longest time I couldn't figure out what the issue was.
